trans-unit.source: Represents a single ink stroke.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en enda linje.

trans-unit.source: A Stroke is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: En linje anger vilket dataobjekt som har samlats in från pekdon, till exempel pennan eller musen.

trans-unit.source: The Stroke can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Streck kan skapas och hanteras programmässigt, och kan representeras visuellt på ett ink-aktiverade element, till exempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A Stroke contains information about both its position and appearance.
trans-unit.target: En linje innehåller information om både positionen och utseende.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property is a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects that specifies the position of the Stroke.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>egenskapen är en samling <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objekt som anger positionen för streck.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> property specifies a stroke's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>egenskapen anger en linjens utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som representerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is empty..
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsär tom...

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som representerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object that specifies the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> objekt som anger hur den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: -or- drawingAtrributes is .
trans-unit.target: -or- drawingAtrributes is .

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is empty.
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsär tom.

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en anpassad egenskap till den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you need to store extra information in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden är användbar om du behöver lagra extra information i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Den unika identifieraren för egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för den anpassade egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`måste vara av typen <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>eller en matris med dessa datatyper utom <xref:System.String>, vilket inte är tillåtet.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The propertyData argument is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: Den propertyData argumentet är inte en av de tillåtna datatyper som anges i den avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: Returns a deep copy of the existing <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en djup kopia av den befintliga <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The properties of an object that is a deep copy of another object have the same values as the properties of the original object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper för ett objekt som är en djup kopia av ett annat objekt har samma värden som egenskaperna för det ursprungliga objektet.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den nya <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object contains the specified custom property.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objektet innehåller den angivna anpassade egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Den unika identifieraren för egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the custom property exists; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> om anpassad egenskap finns; annars returnerar <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Återgivningar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt baserat på den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objekt till som linjen ska renderas.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Återgivningar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt baserat på den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objekt till som linjen ska renderas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object defining the attributes of the stroke that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> -objektet som definierar attributen för det streck som ritas.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> on the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Återgivningar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> på den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> med det angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Override the DrawCore method to perform custom drawing when you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätt DrawCore-metoden för att utföra anpassad ritning när du ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>klass.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objekt till som linjen ska renderas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> object defining the attributes of the stroke that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> -objektet som definierar attributen för det streck som ritas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: These attributes, such as color and width, are applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> object as it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Dessa attribut, till exempel Linjefärg och linjebredd, tillämpas den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>objekt när det ritas.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Changing DrawingAttributes causes the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged> event to fire.
trans-unit.target: Om du ändrar DrawingAttributes resulterar i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged>händelse att utlösas.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: The set value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ange värdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object change.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*>som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt ändras.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs> contains information about the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs>innehåller information om den egenskap som ändras.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can compare the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A> property against the members of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> to see which value changed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan jämföra den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A>egenskapen medlemmarna i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds>att se vilka värdet ändras.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.PropertyGuid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drawing attributes of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object are replaced.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när ritade attributen för en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objektet ersätts.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stylus points the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> uses when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den från penna pekar på <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> används när <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>

trans-unit.source: The GetBezierStylusPoints method returns a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the stylus points that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> uses when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: GetBezierStylusPoints-metoden returnerar en ny <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>som innehåller pennan som den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>använder när den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>egenskapen på den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>egenskap är inställd på `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: To get the stylus points that are used when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> is set to `false`, use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta från pennan punkter som används när <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>är inställd på `false`, använda den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains the stylus points along the spine of a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som innehåller från pennan punkter längs angivna av en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> när <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounding box for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar avgränsningsram för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> structure defining the bounding box for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> struktur som definierar den avgränsar rutan för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som ligger inom de angivna intervallet.

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that is within `lassoPoints`.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult-metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>som innehåller linjer som representerar segmenten i den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>som ligger inom `lassoPoints`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetClipResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult ändras inte ursprungligt <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetClipResult ansluter de första och sista punkten i `lassoPoints` att skapa lasso.

trans-unit.source: The points that specify the line which defines where to clip.
trans-unit.target: Punkter som anger den rad som definierar var du Beskär.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> som innehåller kopior av segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som ligger inom de angivna intervallet.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are within the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som är inom den angivna rektangeln.

trans-unit.source: The GetClipResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that is within `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult-metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>som innehåller linjer som representerar segmenten i den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>som ligger inom `bounds`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetClipResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetClipResult ändras inte ursprungligt <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to clip.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som anger området som clip.

trans-unit.source: A that contains copies of the segments of the current that are within the bounds of bounds.
trans-unit.target: En som innehåller kopior av segmenten i aktuellt som finns inom gränserna för bounds .

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som ligger utanför de angivna gränserna.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that are outside of `lassoPoints`.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult-metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>som innehåller linjer som representerar segmenten i den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>som är utanför `lassoPoints`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult ändras inte ursprungligt <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A> method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A>metoden ansluter de första och sista punkten i `lassoPoints` att skapa lasso.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetClipResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to erase.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> som anger området för att radera.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> som innehåller segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som ligger utanför de angivna gränserna.

trans-unit.source: Returns segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som ligger utanför den angivna rektangeln.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that contains strokes that represent the segments of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> that are outside of `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult-metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>som innehåller linjer som representerar segmenten i den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>som är utanför `bounds`.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult ändras inte ursprungligt <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to erase.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som anger området för att radera.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> som innehåller segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> som är utanför det giltiga intervallet för den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> after it is dissected by the designated path using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> när den är ut av angiven sökväg med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetEraseResult method uses `eraserShape` to hit test the stroke along `eraserPath` and returns a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> that represent dissected segments.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetEraseResult använder `eraserShape` att träffa testa linje längs `eraserPath` och returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>som representerar dissected segment.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: GetEraseResult does not change the original <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: GetEraseResult ändras inte ursprungligt <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path that dissects the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> som anger den sökväg som dissects den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> som anger formen på Radera.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the segments of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> after it is dissected by the specified path.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> som innehåller kopior av segmenten i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> när den är ut av den angivna sökvägen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> aktuella <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetGeometry method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> to customize the shape of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Använd metoden GetGeometry för att få en <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>Anpassa formen av <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Consider caching the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to avoid calling GetGeometry multiple times, which may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: Tänk på att cachelagra den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>för att undvika anropar GetGeometry flera gånger, vilket kan påverka prestanda.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> som representerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> aktuella <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> med det angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The GetGeometry method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> properties of `drawingAttributes` to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetGeometry använder den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>Egenskaper för `drawingAttributes` att fastställa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consider caching the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> to avoid calling GetGeometry multiple times, which may impact performance.
trans-unit.target: Tänk på att cachelagra den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>för att undvika anropar GetGeometry flera gånger, vilket kan påverka prestanda.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that determines the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> som avgör den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> som representerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property data for the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar-egenskapsdata för angiven GUID.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Den unika identifieraren för egenskapen.

trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdär inte associerad med en anpassad egenskap för den .

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Guid> objects.
trans-unit.target: En matris med <xref:System.Guid>objekt.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> intersects the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om aktuella <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> korsar angiven.

trans-unit.source: This method behaves the same way as the overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29> method does when `diameter` is 1.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden fungerar på samma sätt som den överlagrade <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29>metoden utför när `diameter` är 1.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.HitTest%28System.Windows.Point%2CSystem.Double%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> att träffa test.

trans-unit.source: if point intersects the current stroke; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Om point korsar den aktuella linjen, annars .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> is within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> ligger inom de angivna intervallet.

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Metoden HitTest ansluter de första och sista punkten i `lassoPoints` att skapa lasso.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> som representerar området för att träffa test gränser.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, that must be in `lassoPoints` for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: Procentandelen längden på den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, som måste vara i `lassoPoints` för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> anses vara identiska.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current stroke is within the specified bounds; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den aktuella linjen är inom kantlinjerna; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified path intersects the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om den angivna sökvägen korsar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> med det angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The HitTest method uses `stylusShape` to hit test the stroke along `eraserPath`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden HitTest använder `stylusShape` att träffa testa linje längs `eraserPath`.

trans-unit.source: The path that `stylusShape` follows for hit testing
trans-unit.target: Sökvägen som `stylusShape` följer för att testa träffar

trans-unit.source: The shape of `path` with which to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Formen på `path` som att träffa test.

trans-unit.source: if stylusShape intersects the current stroke; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Om stylusShape korsar den aktuella linjen, annars .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> intersects the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om aktuella <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> korsar det angivna området.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that defines the center of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> som definierar i mitten av område att träffa test.

trans-unit.source: The diameter of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Området för att träffa test diameter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified area intersects the current stroke; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om det angivna området korsar aktuella linjen. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> is within the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> ligger inom gränserna för den angivna rektangeln.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to hit test.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som representerar området för att träffa test gränser.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, that must be in `percentageWithinBounds` for the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> to be considered hit..
trans-unit.target: Procentandelen längden på den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, som måste vara i `percentageWithinBounds` för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> anses träffar...

trans-unit.source: if the current stroke is within the bounds of bounds; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Om den aktuella linjen är inom gränserna för bounds , annars .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när utseendet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> ändringar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> handles the Invalidated event and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>hanterar Invalidated händelse och anropar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class and your stroke's appearance is based on a custom state, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> method to raise the Invalidated event.
trans-unit.target: Om du ärver från den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>klass och din linjens utseende baseras på en anpassad tillstånd, måste du anropa den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A>metod för att öka händelsen Invalidated.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter härledda klasser att ändra standardbeteendet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnDrawingAttributesChanged method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: När du åsidosätter metoden i en härledd klass du anropa metoden OnDrawingAttributesChanged i basklassen så att registrerade delegater får händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesReplaced"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter härledda klasser att ändra standardbeteendet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributesReplaced"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnDrawingAttributesReplaced method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: När du åsidosätter metoden i en härledd klass du anropa metoden OnDrawingAttributesReplaced i basklassen så att registrerade delegater får händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributesReplacedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributesReplacedEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> class and your stroke's appearance is based on a custom state, you must call the OnInvalidated method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Om du ärver från den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>klass och din linjens utseende baseras på en anpassad tillstånd, måste du anropa metoden OnInvalidated för att öka den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> handles the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> event and calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>referenser i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated>händelse och anropar den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.Invalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som innehåller informationen om händelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när någon <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> egenskapsändringar.

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: De händelsedata som beskriver den egenskap som ändras, samt gamla och nya värden.

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to modify the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillåter härledda klasser att ändra standardbeteendet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.PropertyDataChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method in a derived class, call the OnPropertyDataChanged method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: När du åsidosätter metoden i en härledd klass du anropa metoden OnPropertyDataChanged i basklassen så att registrerade delegater får händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a custom property from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort en anpassad egenskap från den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the property.
trans-unit.target: Den unika identifieraren för egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the stylus points of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar från pennan punkterna i den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the stylus points that are used when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property is set to `true`, use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta från pennan punkter som är används när den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>egenskapen på den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>egenskap är inställd på `true`, använda den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> assigned to the StylusPoints property must have at least one <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> in it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>tilldelats StylusPoints egenskapen måste ha minst en <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>i det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you try to assign an empty <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> to StylusPoints, or remove all the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects from StylusPoints, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Om du försöker tilldela en tom <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>StylusPoints eller ta bort alla de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objekt från StylusPoints, ett undantag inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains the stylus points that represent the current <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som innehåller från pennan punkter som representerar aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>egenskapsändringar.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> property is assigned a new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>egenskapen tilldelas en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Performs a transformation based upon the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Utför en omvandling baserat på den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>-objektet representerar en 3 x 3-matris som används för omvandlingar i tvådimensionell utrymmet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>

trans-unit.source: Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix.
trans-unit.target: Varje punkt i objektet Stroke transformeras av den angivna matrisen.

trans-unit.source: For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om det ursprungliga värdet för Point.X är 100 det ursprungliga värdet för Point.Y är 55 och omvandling Matrix.Scale (0,5, 0,5), det nya värdet för Point.X är 50 och det nya värdet för Point.Y är 27,5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> object defining the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> -objektet som definierar omvandlingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>tillämpa omvandlingen spets från pennan; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
